Name: Test
Desc: Test

Name: <color=#A42623>Continued DMG Increase</color>
Desc: DMG Bonus +15% every 5s, up to 75%.

Name: <color=#A42623>Signature Boost</color>
Desc: Increase the next Signature DMG by 60% every 5s.

Name: <color=#A42623>3-Ping DMG Increase</color>
Desc: After 3-Ping increase extra DMG bonus by 15%, up to 75% for 8s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Periodic Supply</color>
Desc: Obtain 6 random Signal Orbs of the same color every 5s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Type DMG Increase</color>
Desc: Deal Type DMG equal to ATK x1200% to surrounding enemies every second.

Name: <color=#A42623>Switch Supply</color>
Desc: Gain 12 Signal Orbs after each deployment.

Name: <color=#A42623>Switch Boost</color>
Desc: After switching increase extra DMG bonus by 15%, up to 75% for 10s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Deployment DMG Increase</color>
Desc: Additional DMG Bonus +50% upon deployment. This effect -10% every 5s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Cooldown Reduction</color>
Desc: 3-Ping shortens character switch cooldown by 5s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Deployment DMG</color>
Desc: Deal True DMG equal to [Switch Count] x ATK x 5000% to all enemies on field upon deployment.

Name: <color=#A42623>Attack: Annihilation Enhancement</color>
Desc: Team ATK +50% for every Attacker or Annihilator in the team.

Name: <color=#A42623>Lone Wolf Boost</color>
Desc: ATK +200% when the team consists of only 1 character.

Name: <color=#A42623>Elemental Boost I</color>
Desc: All Elemental DMG +20%

Name: <color=#A42623>Elemental Boost II</color>
Desc: All Elemental DMG +35%

Name: <color=#A42623>An Eye For An Eye</color>
Desc: Upon dealing DMG, inflicts extra Elemental DMG equal to 1000% of HP lost. Cooldown: 2s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Last Stand</color>
Desc: Upon dealing DMG, lose 10% of Max HP and inflict extra Elemental DMG equal to the HP lost x120. Cooldown: 2s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Damage Reversal</color>
Desc: Upon taking DMG, Max HP +800 up to 5000 HP. Cooldown: 0.5s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Elemental Retaliation</color>
Desc: Deal Elemental DMG equal to 1800% of Max HP upon dealing DMG. Cooldown: 1s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Bloodrage Massacre</color>
Desc: Upon triggering QTE, consume 90% of the QTE character's Max HP to deal Elemental DMG equal to consumed HP x10000% to all enemies on field.

Name: <color=#A42623>Energy Conversion</color>
Desc: Upon casting Signature, consume all Energy and increase Max HP by [consumed Energy x20], up to 5000 HP.

Name: <color=#A42623>Quick Shield Break</color>
Desc: All Elemental Resistance of all enemies on field decrease by 30% for 10s upon triggering QTE.

Name: <color=#A42623>Quick Defense</color>
Desc: All on-field characters take 50% less DMG for 5s upon triggering QTE.

Name: <color=#A42623>Elemental Resistance Reduction I</color>
Desc: All Elemental Resistance of all enemies on field decrease by 20%.

Name: <color=#A42623>Elemental Resistance Reduction II</color>
Desc: All Elemental Resistance of all enemies on field decrease by 35%.

Name: <color=#A42623>Impact Shield</color>
Desc: Fixed at 30% when you take more DMG than 30% of your Max HP. Cooldown: 10s.

Name: <color=#A42623>DMG Reduction I</color>
Desc: DMG taken -5%

Name: <color=#A42623>DMG Reduction II</color>
Desc: DMG taken -10%

Name: <color=#A42623>Super Shield</color>
Desc: Gain a Super Armor when protected by a shield.

Name: <color=#A42623>Armor Boost</color>
Desc: Team HP +30% for every Tank in the team.

Name: <color=#A42623>Lone Wolf Bonus</color>
Desc: HP +200% when the team consists of only 1 character.

Name: <color=#A42623>Emergency Defense</color>
Desc: Gain a shield equal to 50% of HP lost when your HP goes below 50%.

Name: <color=#A42623>Effective Healing</color>
Desc: Healing Efficiency +50%

Name: <color=#A42623>Impact Recovery</color>
Desc: Upon taking DMG, recover 12% of your Max HP over 5s. Cooldown: 6s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Quick Healing</color>
Desc: Recover 20% of the team's Max HP upon triggering QTE. Cooldown: 8s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Health Bomb</color>
Desc: Deal True DMG equal to 9000% of healing received to all enemies on field upon receiving healing.

Name: <color=#A42623>Health Sustain</color>
Desc: Recover 3% of Max HP every 2s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Strike Supply</color>
Desc: Receive 3 sets of 3-Ping Orbs at the beginning of the battle.

Name: <color=#A42623>Signal Reconstruction</color>
Desc: After 3-Ping, rearrange Signal Orbs. Cooldown: 4s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Quick Supply</color>
Desc: The on-field character gains 6 Signal Orbs of the same color upon triggering QTE.

Name: <color=#A42623>Quick Recharge</color>
Desc: Recover on-field character Signature Energy by 30% upon triggering QTE.

Name: <color=#A42623>Auto Supply</color>
Desc: Gain 4 sets of 3 Orbs when you have less than 3 Signal Orbs. Cooldown: 8s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Support: Boost Enhancement</color>
Desc: QTE and Switch Cooldown -2s for every Support or Amplifier in the team.

Name: <color=#A42623>Lone Wolf DMG Reduction</color>
Desc: DMG Reduction +20% when the team consists of only 1 character.

Name: <color=#A42623>Switch Reset</color>
Desc: Reset all off-field character switch cooldowns upon switching characters. Cooldown: 8s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Dodge Supply</color>
Desc: Receive 1 Signal Orb when you dodge.

Name: <color=#A42623>Dodge Recharge</color>
Desc: Recover 30% Signature Energy every time you dodge.

Name: <color=#A42623>Auto Matrix</color>
Desc: Enter Matrix every 12s.

Name: <color=#A42623>Battle Power Leap</color>
Desc: Draw 2 bonus Exclusive Talents at Military Support Lv.2, 5, 8, 11, 14, 17, and 20 respectively.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Building Construction: Energy Supply Station</color>
Desc: Energy Supply Station: Reveals the contents within 2 tiles in a cross shape and permanently gives 1 Construction Permit daily.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Energy Conservation</color>
Desc: <color=#4682B4>Lower Construction Permit cost by 1</color> when you build an <color=#4682B4>Energy Supply Station</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Scouting the Wasteland</color>
Desc: <color=#4682B4>Automatically explore</color> the<color=#4682B4> closest area</color> to the Energy Supply Station when you create an <color=#4682B4>Energy Supply Station</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Pioneering Project</color>
Desc: <color=#4682B4>Automatically explore</color> <color=#4682B4>1 area </color>withing the range of Energy Supply Station at the start of each day.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Building Construction: Sentry Tower</color>
Desc: Sentry Tower: Randomly eradicate 1 Danger Zone within its range.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Periodic Removal</color>
Desc: <color=#4682B4>Remove automatically</color> when <color=#4682B4>Sentry Tower</color> becomes active and <color=#4682B4>receive 2 Construction Permits</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Extermination Operation</color>
Desc: The <color=#4682B4>Sentry Tower</color> will clear <color=#4682B4>all Danger Zones</color> within its range.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Specialized Construction</color>
Desc: <color=#4682B4>Sentry Tower will become effective against bosses</color>, but it will only reduce 30% of the boss's current HP.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Building Construction: Supply Depot</color>
Desc: Supply Depot: Impact Range will receive Colored Resource +150.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Simple Warehouse</color>
Desc: <color=#4682B4>Lower Construction Permit cost by 1</color> when you build a <color=#4682B4>Supply Depot</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Victory Bonus</color>
Desc: <color=#4682B4>Tri-Colored Multiplier +2</color> for clearing <color=#4682B4>Danger Zones</color> within the <color=#4682B4>range of Supply Depot</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Storage Returns</color>
Desc: <color=#4682B4>Tri-Colored Multiplier +2</color> after <color=#4682B4>exploring areas within the range of Supply Depot</color> <color=#4682B4>3 times</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Construction Buff</color>
Desc: Receive <color=#4682B4>1 Construction Permit</color> at the <color=#4682B4>start of each day</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Output Refund</color>
Desc: Modifying an area <color=#4682B4>within the building's range</color> will <color=#4682B4>refund 1 Construction Permit</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>High Output</color>
Desc: <color=#4682B4>Buildings in the current area</color> will <color=#4682B4>produce 30 Silver Coins</color> every round.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Solar Power (Scrapped)</color>
Desc: <color=#4682B4>Buildings in the current area</color> will <color=#4682B4>produce 1 Construction Permit</color> every round.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Weaken</color>
Desc: fightevent unofficial - Fighting within the building's range will lower Low-Danger Zone DMG by 10/20/30% and increase DMG taken by Danger Zone by 10/20/30%.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Weaken 2</color>
Desc: fightevent unofficial - Fighting within the building's range will lower Low-Danger Zone DMG by 10/20/30% and increase DMG taken by Danger Zone by 10/20/30%.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Weaken 3</color>
Desc: fightevent unofficial - Fighting within the building's range will lower Low-Danger Zone DMG by 10/20/30% and increase DMG taken by Danger Zone by 10/20/30%.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Building Construction: Residential Area</color>
Desc: Residential Area: (The area's only one) Increase the current area's <color=#4682B4>Action Point by 2 each round</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Victory Recycle</color>
Desc: Recover <color=#4682B4>1 Construction Permit</color> after <color=#4682B4>clearing Danger Zone</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Area Modification: Infrastructure</color>
Desc: Change an area that is <color=#4682B4>not Blue</color> into <color=#4682B4>Blue</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Area Modification: Military</color>
Desc: Change an area that is <color=#4682B4>not Red</color> into <color=#4682B4>Red</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Area Modification: Economy</color>
Desc: Change an area that is <color=#4682B4>not Yellow</color> into <color=#4682B4>Yellow</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Joint Modification</color>
Desc: When modifying the area, <color=#4682B4>1 area within a cross-shape</color> that were mismatched in color will be <color=#4682B4>changed into matching color</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Military Efficiency</color>
Desc: Lower <color=#4682B4>Area Modification: Military</color> <color=#4682B4>cost by 1</color>

Name: <color=#4682B4>Infrastructure Effectiveness</color>
Desc: Lower <color=#4682B4>Area Modification: Infrastructure</color> <color=#4682B4>cost by 1</color>

Name: <color=#4682B4>Economic Efficiency</color>
Desc: Lower <color=#4682B4>Area Modification: Economy</color> <color=#4682B4>cost by 1</color>

Name: <color=#4682B4>Remodelling: Clear the Ruins</color>
Desc: Clear 1 Ruin

Name: <color=#4682B4>Recycle Building Materials</color>
Desc: Receive <color=#4682B4>50 Silver Coins</color> for each <color=#4682B4>Ruin you clear</color>.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Simultaneous Demolition</color>
Desc: Demolish 1 random <color=#4682B4>Ruin</color> within a <color=#4682B4>cross-shaped area</color> at the same time.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Fair Treatment</color>
Desc: Treat both <color=#4682B4>Low-Risk Zone</color> and <color=#4682B4>High-Risk Zone</color> <color=#4682B4>as Ruins</color>, but cost +2.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Modification Debuff</color>
Desc: fightevent unofficial - After modification, decrease Area & Neighboring Danger Zone DMG by 10/20/30% and DMG taken by 10/20/30%.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Modification Debuff</color>
Desc: fightevent unofficial - After modification, decrease Area & Neighboring Danger Zone DMG by 10/20/30% and DMG taken by 10/20/30%.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Modification Debuff</color>
Desc: fightevent unofficial - After modification, decrease Area & Neighboring Danger Zone DMG by 10/20/30% and DMG taken by 10/20/30%.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Building Material Refund</color>
Desc: After <color=#4682B4>modifying the area</color>, <color=#4682B4>get 1 Construction Permit</color> back the next time you build.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Enhancement 2 (Scrapped)</color>
Desc: Increase Colored Talent produced by each area by 5.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Production Buff</color>
Desc: When <color=#4682B4>modifying the area</color>, <color=#4682B4>receive</color> additional <color=#4682B4>Colored Resource</color> for 1 affected area.

Name: <color=#4682B4>Temporary Base</color>
Desc: Build a temporary base that functions as an Energy Supply Station, a Sentry Tower, and a Supply Depot at the same time.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Support: Military Supply</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Summon the Military Supply Depot</color>. Summoning cost increases (daily reset). Gain <color=#9A6A16>+400 Silver Coins</color> with this talent.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Aid: Infrastructure Supply</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Summon the Foundation Supply Depot</color>. Summoning cost increases (daily reset). Gain <color=#9A6A16>+400 Silver Coins</color> with this talent.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Newcomer's Bonus</color>
Desc: Discovered a new supply merchant. <color=#9A6A16>The first item you purchase is free</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Permanent Discount</color>
Desc: All <color=#9A6A16>items are 30% off</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>VIP Privileges</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Unlock Shop Refresh</color>. Your first refresh will not cost Silver Coins.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Action: Proxy Battle</color>
Desc: Now you can use Silver Coins to <color=#9A6A16>conduct Proxy Battle</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Swift Action</color>
Desc: The Silver Coin cost of <color=#9A6A16>Proxy Battle</color> <color=#9A6A16>-20%</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Huge Payoff</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Interest +25</color> per round after conducting <color=#9A6A16>Proxy Battle</color> (can be stacked 1 time)

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Interest Bonus</color>
Desc: Interest <color=#9A6A16>limit +10</color>

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Balance Correction</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Silver Coin +5</color> when you perform incomplete<color=#9A6A16> interest</color> settlement.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Full Interest Reward</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Interest limit +2</color> with a max of 20 when you perform <color=#9A6A16>full interest</color> settlement.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Construction Funds</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Silver Coins +50</color> for every <color=#9A6A16>Construction Permit</color> <color=#9A6A16>used</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Construction Subsidy</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Silver Coins +50</color> for every <color=#9A6A16>Build or Modification performed</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Expertise Reward</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Silver Coins +30</color> when you <color=#9A6A16>explore a Yellow Tile</color> and get 20<color=#9A6A16> more coins last time</color> when you explore another Yellow Tile. The stacks reset when you flip over a non-yellow tile.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Top Bounty Target</color>
Desc: The Map will <color=#9A6A16>generate </color>1 <color=#9A6A16>Little Kuroro </color>(Defeat to receive Silver Coin x99, Special Registration Form x1, and Standard File Box x1)

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Interdimensional Invasion</color>
Desc: All <color=#9A6A16>Low-Risk Zone enemies</color> will be replaced by: <color=#9A6A16>Mysterious Kuroro</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Shopping Funds</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Silver Coins +80</color> when you enter a <color=#9A6A16>new shop</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Trading Reward</color>
Desc: Receive <color=#9A6A16>Silver Coins equal to the number of purchases made today x10</color> during <color=#9A6A16>daily tally</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Big Bonus</color>
Desc: Receive <color=#9A6A16>200 Silver Coins</color>

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Bounty Hunter</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Silver Coins +30</color> for every <color=#9A6A16>Danger Zone</color> <color=#9A6A16>eliminated</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Small Bonus</color>
Desc: Receive <color=#9A6A16>100 Silver Coins</color>

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Seasoned Bounty Hunter</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Silver Coins +100</color> for every <color=#9A6A16>Danger Zone</color> <color=#9A6A16>cleared</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Huge Expertise Reward</color>
Desc: Interest <color=#9A6A16>limit +15</color>

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Credit Increase</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Silver Coin +8</color> when you perform <color=#9A6A16>incomplete interest</color> settlement.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Major Balance Correction</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Interest limit +4</color> with a max of 20 when you perform <color=#9A6A16>full interest</color> settlement.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Major Full-Interest Reward</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Silver Coins +45</color> when you <color=#9A6A16>explore a Yellow Area</color> and get 30<color=#9A6A16> more coins last time</color> when you explore another Yellow Tile. The stacks reset when you explore a non-yellow area.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Huge Shopping Funds</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Silver Coins +120</color> when you enter a <color=#9A6A16>new shop</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Average Bounty Hunter</color>
Desc: <color=#9A6A16>Silver Coins +45</color> for every <color=#9A6A16>Danger Zone</color> <color=#9A6A16>cleared</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Gold Mining</color>
Desc: Receive <color=#9A6A16>233 Silver Coins</color> <color=#9A6A16>daily</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Action: Proxy Battle</color>
Desc: Now you can use Silver Coins to <color=#9A6A16>conduct Proxy Battle</color>.

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Huge Bonus</color>
Desc: Receive <color=#9A6A16>600 Silver Coins</color>

Name: <color=#9A6A16>Divine Power</color>
Desc: Immediately unlock a shop tile in the blank area on map.
